tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_feedback_ratings (
  user_id INT,
  challenge_id INT,
  feedback TEXT,
  rating INT,
  date_submitted TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ar_challenges (
    challenge_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    challenge_name TEXT,
    user_id INT,
    completion_status BOOLEAN,
    feedback_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_feedback(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (feedback_id) REFERENCES user_feedback(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    challenge_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  challenge_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE user_ratings (
  rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  challenge_id INT,
  rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE challenges (
  challenge_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  challenge_name VARCHAR(255),
  challenge_difficulty VARCHAR(50),
  challenge_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  join_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    challenge_id UUID,
    rating INT,
    comment TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ratings (
    rating_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    challenge_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    rating INT,
    comments TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);
